popup.title: GSOPs 2.6
popup.content:
Thank you for installing GSOPs version 2.6.0, the most versatile Gaussian Splats editing toolset. Among other things, this update includes support for 2DGS, Solaris, and model mirroring.

GSOPs is actively used by professional artists and studios worldwide, and we are committed to keeping GSOPs free and open source. Your support helps sustain its development.

Please enjoy!
